name: Regen
text: Heal HP every 2 seconds.

name: Instant Heal
text: Instantly heal HP.

text: Increase attack.

name: Defense
text: Increase defense.

text: Increase agility.

name: Critical
text: Increase critial rate.

name: Skill Charge Rate
text: Increase skill gauge charge ammount.

name: Immunity
text: Gain immunity from all debuffs. Any debuffs you had are removed immediately.

name: Invincible
text: Ignores all damage and debuffs.

name: Immortality
text: HP will not fall below 1, even after a fatal blow.

name: Vampirism
text: Covert some damage dealt by your attack into HP.

name: Resurrection
text: Instantly ressurect a fallen ally.

name: Skill Charge Speed
text: Increase skill charge speed. Stacks with Skill Charge Rate Up.

name: Instant Heal
text: Increase effectiveness of instant heal skills.

name: Skill Defense
text: Increase defense against all skill attacks.

name: Skill Damage
text: Increase final damage of skill attacks.

name: Normal Skill Damage
text: Increase final damage of normal skills.

name: Slide Skill Damage
text: Increase final damage of slide skills.

name: Drive Skill Damage
text: Increase final damage of drive skills.

name: Critical Rate
text: Increase critical attack rate.

name: Skill Attack
text: Increase damage of skill attacks. Does not apply to basic attacks and drive skills.

name: Drive Charge
text: Increase drive charge.

name: Evasion
text: Increase evasion rate against skill attacks.

name: Debuff Evasion
text: Increase evasion rate against harmful effects.

name: Reflect
text: Reflect damage recieved back to your enemy. Does not apply to drive skills and DoT.

name: Weakpoint Defense
text: Increase defense against weakpoint attacks.

name: Critcal Attack
text: Increase critical attack damage.

name: Weakpoint Attack
text: Increase damage of weakpoint attacks.

name: Regen
text: Increase effectiveness of regen skills.

name: Basic Attack
text: Increase basic attack damage.

name: Normal Skill Attack
text: Increase normal skill damage.

name: Slide Skill Attack
text: Increase slide skill damage.

name: Revenge
text: Stores damage taken for the duration and deals it back to the enemy with the next attack.

name: Drive Damage
text: Increase drive skill damage.

name: Normal Skill Defense
text: Increase defense against normal skills.

name: Slide Skill Defense
text: Increase defense against slide skills.

name: Debuff Duration
text: Shorten duration of harmful effects.

name: Taunt
text: Become the target of all enemy attacks. Does not affect AoE attacks.

name: Emergency Blood Transfusion
text: Distribute part of your HP to your allies.

name: Auto Attack Barrage
text: Attack using multiple basic attacks.

name: Normal Skill Barrage
text: Attack using multiple normal attacks.

name: Additional Damage
text: Deal additional damage.

name: Ignore Defense Damage
text: Ignore defense and deals more damage.

name: Hp Absorb
text: Dealing damage will heal some HP.

name: Add Skill Charge
text: Instantly charge the skill gauge by a certain ammount.

name: Add Drive Charge
text: Instantly charge the drive gauge by a certain ammount.

name: Double-edged Sword
text: Increase attack while decreasing defense.

name: Skill Defense
text: Increase defense against all skill attacks.

name: Debuff Immunity
text: Remove all debuffs instantly.

name: Drive Defense
text: Increase defense against drive skills.

name: Attack-defense Switch
text: Switch attack and defense stats for the duration.

name: Full Charge
text: Instantly fully charge the skill gauge.

name: Cooldown Reduction
text: Reduce cooldown time of slide skills.

name: Concentration
text: Attacks will always be critical and will never miss. Ignore debuffs that affect accuracy and critical rate.

name: Lifelink
text: Some damage recieved is converted into HP and sent to lowest HP ally.

name: Fighting Spirit
text: Increase attack based on number of buffs (up to 3 stacks).

name: Silence Resitance
text: Increase evasion against silence.

name: Poison Damage
text: Decrease damage from poison.

name: Long Range Attack
text: Ignore taunt and reflect damage.

name: Debuff Removal
text: Remove one harmful effect.

name: Endure
text: Nullify damage from debuffs and remove from the stack.

name: Berserk
text: Increase damage and oncoming attacks and debuffs. After the duration, become stunned for 5 seconds.

name: Remove Sleep Debuff
text: Remove and can not recieve any sleep debuffs for the duration.

name: Remove Silence Debuff
text: Remove and can not recieve any silence debuffs for the duration.

name: Remove Confusion Debuff
text: Remove and can not recieve any confusoion debuffs for the duration.

name: Remove Stun Debuff
text: Remove and can not recieve any stun debuffs for the duration.

name: Remove Petrify Debuff
text: Remove and can not recieve any petrify debuffs for the duration.

name: Remove Freeze Debuff
text: Remove and can not recieve any freeze debuffs for the duration.

name: Remove Disable Debuff
text: Remove and can not recieve any disable debuffs for the duration.

name: Remove Dot

name: Remove Skill Damage Debuff

name: Remove Skill Defense Debuff

name: Remove Petrify+freeze Deuff
text: Remove and can not recieve any petrify and freeze debuffs for the duration.

name: Hp Shield
text: Create a shield that takes damage before HP is damaged.

name: Purification
text: Converts bleed into regen healing.

name: Cheer
text: Increase weakpoint damage based on the number of cheers stacks.

name: Excessive Bleeding
text: Increase bleed damage.

name: Fallen Resurrection
text: When HP reaches 0, instantly resurects with HP, fully charged skill gauge, and increase attack.

name: Chain Strike
text: While the buff is active, killing an enemy will deal additional damage to the rest of the enemies.

name: Overload
text: Increase skill cool down, reduce all skill damage, except drives, and reduce skill charge speed.

name: Direct Hit
text: Ignore enemy's endure.

name: Awakening
text: Increase critical damage and slide damage based on allies' buffs.

name: Remove Curse Debuff
text: Remove and can not recieve any attribute debuffs for the duration.

name: Elixir
text: Recover HP when attacking or being attacked.

name: Remove Heal Block Debuff
text: Remove and can not recieve any heal block debuffs for the duration.

name: Petrifying Gaze
text: When attacked by an enemy, have a chance to petrify them.

name: Sharp Blade
text: Increase skill damaged based on allies' buffs

name: Detoxify
text: Remove poison and instantly heal HP equal to 1 poison damage.

name: Winding Conviction_ii
text: Recoved HP based on the number of buffs on your team.

name: Remove Burn And Deadly Poison Debuff
text: Remove and can not recieve any burn and deadly poison debuffs for the duration.

name: Remove Water Balloon Debuff
text: Remove and can not recieve any water ballon debuffs for the duration.

name: Evil Within
text: Gives +1 to debuff stack.

name: Pain Adaptation
text: Increase defense relative to the ammount of defense reduced on allies.

name: Pain Sublimation
text: Increase attack relative to the ammount of attack reduced on allies.

name: Debuff Diversion
text: Diverts debuff 1 time per 1 debuff.

name: Remove Death Heal Debuff
text: Remove and can not recieve any death heal debuffs for the duration.

name: Dot Evasion Increase
text: Increase evasion against damage over time debuffs.

name: Attack Stance
text: Only childs given attack stance will attack during fever.

name: Ignore Reflect Damage
text: Ignore enemy reflect for the duration.

name: Remove Freeze Bomb Debuff
text: Remove and can not recieve any freeze bomb debuffs for the duration.

name: Max Hp Increase
text: Create a shield that increases maximum HP.

name: Resuscitation
text: When HP hits 0, remove all buffs and debuffs and resurrect immediately.

name: Debuff Taunt
text: Become the target of debuffs, up to 2 debuffs per attack.

name: Time Distortion
text: Remove all time debuffs and increase skill charge speed by 40%.

name: Acute Posioning
text: Increase poison damage.

name: Nullify Shock
text: Remove Shock debuff and effect.

name: Freeze Shield
text: Increase defense and, when attacked, reduce enemy's skill charge speed.

name: Freeze Shield
text: Increase defense and, when attacked, reduce enemy's skill charge speed.

name: Curse Damage Increase
text: 대상이 사용하는 저주의 대미지를 증가시킵니다.

name: Streak
text: If you kill an enemy while the buff is active, it deals extra damage to the remaining enemies.

name: Defense
text: Become the target of all enemy attacks. Does not affect AoE attacks.

name: Attack
text: Reduce attack.

name: Defense
text: Reduce defense.

name: Agility
text: Reduce agility.

name: Bleed
text: Continously deals damage.

name: Confusion
text: Attacks are redirected towards allies instead of enemies. Enemies will receive buffs instead of allies. Allies will be debuffed instead of enemies. Drives and resurections are not affected.

name: Skill Charge Rate
text: Reduce skill gauge charge rate.

name: Sleep
text: Can not use skills, reset skill charge, and defense is reduced to 0. Removed after being hit by a skil attack, except basic attacks.

name: Critical Chance
text: Reduces the chance of a critical strike.

name: Drive Charge
text: Reduces the drive charge rate.

name: Skill Charge Speed
text: Reduce the speed of skill charge. Can be stacked with charge rate reduction.

text: Reduce final damage of skill attacks.

text: Reduce defense against normal skills.

name: Slide Defense

name: Poison

name: Remove Skill Charge
text: Remove a certain amount of skill charge.

name: Remove Drive Charge
text: Remove a certain ammount drive gauge charge.

name: Time Bomb
text: Take damage after a certain ammount of time.

name: Heal Block
text: Healing will not restore HP.

name: Death Heal
text: Healing does not restore HP, but does damage instead.

name: Blind
text: Decrease accuracy of attacks.

name: Petrify
text: Can not use skills and stop skill charge until attacked a certain amount of times.

name: Drive Defense
text: Reduce defense against drive skills.

name: Attack-defense Switch
text: Switch attack and defense stats for the duration.

name: Debuff Explosion
text: Remove one debuff and deal damage.

name: Skill Defense
text: Reduce defense against all skill attacks.

name: Exhaustion
text: Increase slide skill cooldown.

name: Decomposition
text: Continuously deals damage.

name: Smash
text: Stun and reduce skill defense.

name: Shock
text: Deals damage and when attacked, causes 20% of the DoT damage to a random target and has a chance to reset skill gauge.

name: Stun
text: Stop all actions and reset skill gauge. (increase duration by 1 second when stunned again during the duration, up to 5 seconds)

name: Silence
text: Can not use skills and reset skill charge. Cooldown time is fixed while in cooldown.

name: Freeze
text: Reduce skill charge speed and increase damage done by DOT debuffs.

name: Deadly Poison
text: Deal damage over time and reduce healing by 50%. Can not be extended or shortened.

name: Abrasion
text: Increase duration of Bleed by 4 seconds and increase damage by 200.

name: Deducted Growing Overlap
text: Remove target stacking buffs (Attack/defense power) by number of stacks.

name: Curse
text: Continuously deals damage and additional damage once the duration is over.

name: Curse Amplification
text: Increase curse duration by 4 seconds and increase damage by 200.

name: Time Reversal
text: Remove all enemy time buffs and reduce skill charge rate by 40%.

name: Tsunami
text: Deal damage to enemies based on number of Water Type Allies

name: Anti Barrier
text: 보호막 해제 및 보호막 HP 잔여량에 따른 비례 대미지

name: Stigma
text: Continuously deal damage in proportion to the number of buffs on the enemy.

name: Winding_1
text: Deal damage proportional to the number of debuffs on the the target.

name: Cut
text: Deal damage and increase continous damage.

name: Burn
text: Reduce skill defense and burns after each attack.

name: Water Balloon
text: When attacked, take damage and, when duration is over or stack is reduced, reset skill gauge.

name: Dancing Blade
text: Continuously deal damage and reduces defense.

name: Charm
text: New buffs can not be applied during the duration. Can not be removed.

name: Target
text: Changes skill attack priority towards the targeted enemy.

text: 적이 사용하는 DOT 계열 디버프에 의한 대미지 감소

name: Crackin Off
text: 적의 버티기를 해제합니다

name: Reset Skill
text: Discharge skill gauge immediately

name: Freeze Bomb
text: After the duration, reset skill gauge and deal a certain ammount of damage.

name: Debuff Accuracy Reduction
text: Reduce debuff Accuracy.

name: Deadly Poison Amplification
text: Increase Deadly Poison damage by 300 and reduce healing by -30%

text: Dark Type Ally Water에 비례하여 Enemy's 데미지

name: Buff Explosion
text: Remove 1 buff from the enemy and deal damage.

text: Remove 1 heal buff from the enemy and deal damage.

text: Remove 1 shield buff from the enemy and deal damage.

name: Buff Explosion (skill defense)

text: Converts a certan ammount of damage done to the enemy and deals it to 2 lowest HP enemies.

name: Buff Steal
text: Remove an enemy's buff and give it to yourself.

text: 목속성 아군 수에 비례하여 대상의 약점 공격에 대한 방어가 감소합니다.

name: Burn
text: Reduce skill defense and causes burn bleeding when attacked

name: Wetness
text: Reduce skill gauge charge by -40% and damage from water type enemies is increased or decreased depending on type (-40% for forest type, +40% for fire type).

name: Damage For Each Ally (Forest)
text: 목속성 아군 수에 비례하여 적에게 대미지

name: Damage For Each Ally (Light)
text: 광속성 아군 수에 비례하여 적에게 대미지

name: Additional Damage Per Buff
text: Deal additional damage based on your own buffs.

name: Magic Damage
text: Deals additional damage. Increase critical damage.

name: Debuff Extension
text: Extends duration of debuffs.

name: Encroachment
text: Continuously deal damage based on the ammount of debuffs on the enemy.

name: Buff Absorption
text: Absorb (remove) 1 enemy buff and charge drive gauge.

name: Buff Off Recovery
text: 회복 계열 버프를 해제하고 지속시간 동안 해당 효과에 대해 면역 상태가 됩니다.

name: Protection Buff Off
text: 보호 계열 버프를 해제하고 지속시간 동안 해당 효과에 대해 면역 상태가 됩니다.

name: Buff Time Off
text: 시간 계열 버프를 해제하고 지속시간 동안 해당 효과에 대해 면역 상태가 됩니다.

name: Fury Buff Off Explosions
text: 분노폭발 버프를 해제하고 지속시간 동안 해당 효과에 대해 면역 상태가 됩니다.

name: Buff Removal
text: Remove 1 buff that can be removed.

name: Disable Leader Buff
text: The effect of the leader buff used by the target is negated.

text: バフ・デバフに属さない固定ダメージ

name: クリティカル時スキルゲージチャージ
text: 味方の回復スキルがクリティカルになった場合、該当味方のスキルゲージを一定量チャージ

name: 回避率↑
text: スキルに対しての回避率を増加

name: クリティカル固定ダメージ

name: 時間系固定ダメージ
text: 自身が時間系バフ中の場合、敵に固定ダメージを付与

name: 吸血
text: 攻撃で与えたダメージの一部を自身のHPに転換する

name: 気絶
text: スキルゲージ初期化＆行動不可(気絶状態で攻撃を受けると維持時間を1秒ずつ追加、最大5秒)

name: 時間系バフ中、固定ダメージ
text: 敵に固定ダメージ
